r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with libvips
r.d: This extension uses libvips to provide image processing facilities.
r.n: * Use VIPS_SONAME, if we can * More stuff in php_info(), see https://github.com/jcupitt/php-vips/issues/32 * Add vips_foreign_find_load() and vips_foreign_find_load_buffer(), see https://github.com/jcupitt/php-vips/issues/37
